sourcesContent: import React, { useState, useEffect, Link } from 'react' import Video from '../../videos/video.mp4' import { Button } from '../ButtonElements' import { HeroContainer, HeroBg, VideoBg, HeroContent, HeroH1, HeroP, HeroBtnWrapper, ArrowForward, ArrowRight, } from './HeroElements' import Typing from 'react-typing-animation' const HeroSection = () => { const [hover, setHover] = useState(false) const onHover = () => { setHover(!hover) } return ( Join my Youtube channel where I talk everything coffee, tech and lifestyle! ) } export default HeroSection
